title: Ticket #5361: Remove pool password file during stack deletion.
description:
We currently delete the pool password file when condor_annex terminates, which causes grief for Spot instances. After discussing it with JimK, we'll just leave the pool password in the private S3 bucket until the stack terminates, instead.

We need to (a) remove the pool password file on stack deletion and (b) not delete the pool password on termination of condor_annex.
